entry.title: RT $MIGUEL Piedrafita (🫐, 🫐): When I was learning Solidity, I remember feeling like there were no good resources to go beginner ➡️ intermediat...
entry.summary: RT $MIGUEL Piedrafita (🫐, 🫐) When I was learning Solidity, I remember feeling like there were no good resources to go beginner ➡️ intermediate To continue learning, I built simplified versions of popular apps (ENS, OpenSea, Gnosis, ...) Might be helpful for those on the path now 👇 https://github.com/m1guelpf/lil-web3

entry.title: RT Devin Abbott: What's the use case for web3 beyond NFT/crypto speculation? Geo, hopefully, is one answer to that question. Created by @edgeandnode a...
entry.summary: RT Devin Abbott What's the use case for web3 beyond NFT/crypto speculation? Geo, hopefully, is one answer to that question. Created by @edgeandnode and powered by @graphprotocol, it also fits my vision of web3 as backend infrastructure for apps. Here's why https://medium.com/@devinabbott/meet-geo-a-browser-for-web3-content-and-my-vision-for-web3-as-backend-infrastructure-for-apps-3b0cef1d7a0
